agreement.name: agreement
agreement.definition: A set of legally binding rights and obligations between two or more legal entities.

agreement_term.name: agreement_term
agreement_term.definition: Legally enforceable condition set forth within the bounds of an agreement.

brand.name: brand
brand.definition: A name, symbol, or design that identifies and differentiates products, offerings, or organizational identities.

business_entity.name: business_entity
business_entity.definition: A legal body or bodies that comprises or comprise a single organization.

campaign.name: campaign
campaign.definition: An outreach activity that targets a specific population, for example, customers, human resources, partners, and patients, to achieve a certain goal, such as marketing awareness, hiring activities, and health awareness.

channel.name: channel
channel.definition: A digital, analog, or physical conduit through which products, related services, or communications are delivered or received, including the Internet, phone, delivery service, satellite, radio, or physical means.

competency.name: competency
competency.definition: The skills and knowledge necessary to do something.

content.name: content
content.definition: A creative work, such as is manifested in audio/visual, still image, textual, experiential, mixed-media, or other forms.

customer.name: customer
customer.definition: A legal entity that has, plans to have, or has had an agreement with the organization, or is a recipient or beneficiary of the organization's products or services.

decision.name: decision
decision.definition: A conclusion or resolution reached after considering alternative options.

event.name: event
event.definition: An occurrence that has happened or may happen, especially one of importance, concern, or interest.

facility.name: facility
facility.definition: A physical structure at a given place where business is conducted.

currency.name: currency
currency.definition: An agreed medium of value exchange.

financial_account.name: financial_account
financial_account.definition: A named container of monetary value transactions that are typically organized into assets, liabilities, income, expense, equity, and other related categories.

financial_forecast.name: financial_forecast
financial_forecast.definition: A prediction of a future financial aspect of the organization.

financial_transaction.name: financial_transaction
financial_transaction.definition: An instance of a monetary amount movement or related exchange across businesses, agreements, or financial accounts.

monetary_amount.name: monetary_amount
monetary_amount.definition: A representation of value as expressed in a given currency.

payment.name: payment
payment.definition: An obligation to remit or receive a monetary amount between an organization and a customer, partner, or other external party.

tax.name: tax
tax.definition: A compulsory contribution of monetary value to governing bodies.

human_resource.name: human_resource
human_resource.definition: An individual who has, plans to have, or has had a legal agreement with the organization, which includes compensation and other benefits, on a temporary or permanent basis.

incident.name: incident
incident.definition: An unplanned, disruptive, or potentially disruptive, experience.

initiative.name: initiative
initiative.definition: A coordinated collection of temporary endeavors undertaken to create a unique outcome.

inquiry.name: inquiry
inquiry.definition: A question, request, feedback, or comment that may exist inside or outside of the business, which can be received, identified, harvested, disseminated, classified, and tracked.

intellectual_property_rights.name: intellectual_property_rights
intellectual_property_rights.definition: Legal protections, such as patents, trademarks, and copyrights.

interaction.name: interaction
interaction.definition: A set of contemporaneous collaborations or contacts about a given subject, over a span of time, between two or more entities, using one or more channels, at one or more physical or virtual locations such as meetings, interviews, seminars, or consultations.

investment_portfolio.name: investment_portfolio
investment_portfolio.definition: A set of resources expected to increase in value or provide income.

job.name: job
job.definition: A named category of accountabilities, whether remunerative or non-remunerative, associated with an assigned, specific, and accountable business duty, role, or function that can be executed by a human or non-human resource.

language.name: language
language.definition: A method of communication or dialect variant consisting of units of representation or meaning, such as numbers, words, symbols, sounds, or other physical manifestations and gestures, presented in a structured way.

legal_proceeding.name: legal_proceeding
legal_proceeding.definition: An activity invoking the power of a tribunal to enforce a law.

market.name: market
market.definition: Individuals, populations of individuals, or organizations constituting the demand for existing or future products and services.

message.name: message
message.definition: A verbal, written, recorded, or digitally-represented communication, including missives, notifications, alerts, and other internally or externally targeted communication about the organization's mission, products, plans, activities, and other focal points.

order.name: order
order.definition: A request by one party to another to buy, sell, or exchange goods or services.

partner.name: partner
partner.definition: A legal entity that has, plans to have, or has had some degree of involvement with the organization.

plan.name: plan
plan.definition: A set of related activities to achieve a result.

policy.name: policy
policy.definition: A course or principle of action adopted or proposed by an organization.

product.name: product
product.definition: A named combination of goods and services that can be offered to customers, in whole or in part.

research.name: research
research.definition: A systematic investigation into materials and sources.

schedule_element.name: schedule_element
schedule_element.definition: A line item that aligns time and one or more other objects, including work item, human resource, payment, event, and location.

strategy.name: strategy
strategy.definition: An integrated pattern and perspective that aligns an organizationâ€™s goals, objectives, and action sequences into a cohesive whole.

action_item.name: action_item
action_item.definition: A specific course to be taken to achieve an objective.

goal.name: goal
goal.definition: An end toward which effort is or should be directed.

objective.name: objective
objective.definition: A quantitative, measurable result that defines strategy.

vision.name: vision
vision.definition: An imagined future state of being.

submission.name: submission
submission.definition: A container that is used to exchange one or more requests, inquiries, messages, notifications, or other content between parties.

time.name: time
time.definition: A point or duration in the past, present, or future.

training_course.name: training_course
training_course.definition: The structured theoretical or practical subject matter in a consumable format, associated with a curriculum, workshop, or seminar.

work_item.name: work_item
work_item.definition: A defined, well-bounded task that may be assigned to a stakeholder or corresponding asset.

work_queue.name: work_queue
work_queue.definition: A container to hold, sequence, filter, structure, and present a set of work items.

geographic_space.name: geographic_space
geographic_space.definition: A physical area across land, air, and water, in order to provide for the well-being of, and enable or restrict access to, that space as needed to meet economic, environmental, security, health, recreational, and other needs that arise.

geographic_border.name: geographic_border
geographic_border.definition: A line of demarcation around a geographic space or between one geographic space and another geographic space.

geographic_space_cadaster.name: geographic_space_cadaster
geographic_space_cadaster.definition: A geometric description of area parcels, extent, value, ownership, tenure, rights, restrictions, and responsibilities associated with a property area or space.

investment.name: investment
investment.definition: Any type of monetary asset purchased with the idea that the asset will provide income in the future or will be sold at a higher price for a profit.

conveyor.name: conveyor
conveyor.definition: Any variety of an apparatus, whether human- or robot-piloted, that has the capacity to transport people, animals, goods, assets, or other physical items, and includes, but is not limited to trucks, carts, automobiles, rail-based vehicles and assemblies, air-borne craft, water-borne craft, animal-pulled devices, and animal-assemblies.

infrastructure.name: infrastructure
infrastructure.definition: A physical structure or facility, which may include, for example, a building, station, bridge, tunnel, rail corridor, or roadway.

material.name: material
material.definition: Physical matter used in the construction and maintenance of assets and infrastructure, and the powering of physical products and conveyors.

network.name: network
network.definition: A set of connected arcs and nodes that may be associated with a system of infrastructure, assets, locations, routes, and other business objects.

network_arc.name: network_arc
network_arc.definition: A connection or association between nodes in a network.

network_node.name: network_node
network_node.definition: A connection point in a network.

operation.name: operation
operation.definition: An orchestration of work to achieve a specific objective constrained by time and location that include, for example, flight turnaround, package sorting, loading/unloading, boarding, and service centers.

route.name: route
route.definition: A way or course taken in getting from a starting point to a destination, which may include stops along the way.

shipment.name: shipment
shipment.definition: Freight, cargo, baggage, or packages containing a wide range of inanimate or non-human living contents.

shipment_item.name: shipment_item
shipment_item.definition: A single unit of freight, cargo, baggage, or package that is part of an overall shipment.

trip.name: trip
trip.definition: A journey between a starting point location and one or more targeted locations, until a final destination is reached.

meeting.name: meeting
meeting.definition: A gathering of two or more persons at a determinable time and place, including physical and virtual engagements, conferences, or related gatherings.

accreditation.name: accreditation
accreditation.definition: An endorsement by a duly recognized and acknowledged third party that indicates ability, competence, knowledge, provenance, or quality.

dispute.name: dispute
dispute.definition: An official argument or disagreement among interested parties.

energy.name: energy
energy.definition: Sources of power, such as but not limited to, those derived from the utilization of physical or chemical resources, especially to provide light and heat and to work devices and machines.

financial_position.name: financial_position
financial_position.definition: A consolidated and holistic representation of actual financial standing or activity for a point in time or duration.

order_item.name: order_item
order_item.definition: An order element that refers to a specific good or service.

product_forecast.name: product_forecast
product_forecast.definition: An estimate, prediction, or projection for period of time for a given product.

course_of_action.name: course_of_action
course_of_action.definition: A set of activities to be taken to achieve an objective.

beneficiary.name: beneficiary
beneficiary.definition: A legal entity that has, plans to have, or has had an agreement with the organization, or is a recipient of or derives an advantage from the organization's products or services.

biological_organism.name: biological_organism
biological_organism.definition: Non-human living things, including all categories of animals, plants, and microorganisms that are part of the earth's ecosystem, react to stimuli, consume natural resources to grow, thrive, reproduce, and can affect the well-being of beneficiaries.

evidence.name: evidence
evidence.definition: A supported body of facts, upon which to base proof, or establish truth or falsehood, in accordance with rules, such as for privacy or preservation.

financial_instrument.name: financial_instrument
financial_instrument.definition: A tradeable asset, such as stocks, bonds, bills of exchange, futures, options, evidence of ownership, and cash.

health_condition.name: health_condition
health_condition.definition: A physical or mental disorder, disease, illness, injury, impairment, state, medical disabilities, or non-medical disabilities, that may permanently or temporarily affect and can be associated with living things including human beings and other biological organisms.

natural_resource.name: natural_resource
natural_resource.definition: Matter that can occur in nature.

standard.name: standard
standard.definition: A defined convention, specification, or measurement, as confirmed by a recognized governance body.

vote.name: vote
vote.definition: A formal indication of choice such as for a candidate election, referendum, or proposition.

claim.name: claim
claim.definition: A demand or request to indemnify a customer or the provider of services under the terms of an agreement.

device.name: device
device.definition: A machine, contrivance, implant, or in vitro reagent that is recognized, identifiable, and cataloged as an approach to reduce the likelihood of a claim, or mitigate the outcomes of a claim.

case.name: case
case.definition: A plan of action to, act on, report on, resolve, or otherwise address an instance of a need or demand that requires resolution, such as in the context of legal, ongoing healthcare, or claim.

cadaster.name: cadaster
cadaster.definition: A geometric description of area parcels, extent, value, ownership, tenure, rights, restrictions, and responsibilities associated with a property area or space.

constituent.name: constituent
constituent.definition: An individual or entity relative to an organization's sphere of responsibility.

government_service.name: government_service
government_service.definition: A named combination of goods, doing-of-work-for-others, and entitlements that can be offered to constituents.

legislation.name: legislation
legislation.definition: A set of authoritative directives that include laws or related statutory instruments.

license.name: license
license.definition: An authorization to perform a regulated activity, awarded by duly recognized governmental agency or third party, applied to an individual or organization, to engage in an activity, such as fishing, or use of regulated objects, such as modes of transportation or hazardous materials.

license_term.name: license_term
license_term.definition: A legally enforceable condition set forth within the bounds of a license.

public_sector_entity.name: public_sector_entity
public_sector_entity.definition: A governmental body or collection of governmental bodies.

collateral.name: collateral
collateral.definition: Property or other asset that a customer offers as security to a borrowing or lending agreement.
